## Pre-submission Checklist

- [ ] Logic invariants pass (`npm run validate`)
- [ ] Schema validation passes (`npm run validate:schema`)
- [ ] Formatting is clean (`npm run format:check`)
- [ ] **Phase 7 check**: If changing `registry.json`, I have followed [docs/registry-guidelines.md](docs/registry-guidelines.md).
- [ ] **Phase 7 check**: If changing `registry.schema.json` (rare), I have updated `schema_version`.

## Description

<!-- Please include a summary of the change and which tool/capability it affects. -->

- Added tool: `...`
- Fixed typo in: `...`
- Updated schema: `...`

## Breaking Changes

- [ ] This change modifies the schema significantly.
- [ ] This change requires downstream updates (e.g. bundle structure).
- [ ] None.
